item.description: NEW WALK -This Saturday, Nov. 20th the weather will be Wonderful for a Woodland Walk in Berlin, MA ( at the Berlin and Hudson town line), Called Gates Pond. This easy 3 mile walk goes through the woods along the water's edge. Parking is Free. We will begin this lovely adventure at 10 am. Come join us for this lovely adventure ! Bring some laughter. Yes, dogs are welcome too. Directions: From route 495 take exit 26 (Berlin) onto Route 62. At bottom of ramp go towards Berlin, for approx. 1/2 mile. You will see Taylor Street on the left JUST before a gas station. Take Left onto Taylor Street. Take this until it dead ends into a parking lot. Taylor Street is approx. a mile. We will meet in Parking lot. If you use Google maps - you will see Taylor street off of Route 62.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Parking Lot at end of Taylor Street. Berlin, MA Free Parking.
item.name: Autumn Woodland Walk at Gates Pond in Berlin, MA (near Hudson, MA)
